# [Interview #1160: Shadows of Self-Oak Brook, IL, Entry #9](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=1160#9)

#### Question

When do you think the next Stormlight book will come out?

#### Brandon Sanderson

We're shooting for Christmas 2016.
